description:
Add video and audio chat to your Bubble app with the Daily video chat plugin for Bubble.

[b]Features:[/b]
🔥 Add real-time video and audio chat
🔥 Host multiple participants in a single video call
🔥 Create live streams and webinars
🔥 Enable shared chat
🔥 Split participants into breakout rooms

[img=560x315]https://res.cloudinary.com/dpfmaccxx/image/upload/v1727828385/chatplugindemo_yxpv8u.gif[/img]


If you want to do more with your video and audio in your app, the [color=#1f2de6][url=https://bubble.io/plugin/daily-video--audio-plus-1727441795463x240182085842370560]PLUS version[/url][/color] offers additional features like real-time transcription, post-meeting transcripts, and custom integrations. See the comparison below for details.

Post your questions in the [color=#1f2de6][url=https://forum.bubble.io/t/new-free-plugin-daily-video-chat/153885]forum discussion[/url][/color] or check out our [color=#1f2de6][url=https://addons.lunchpaillabs.com/support/plans]support plans[/url][/color].

[b]About Lunch Pail Labs[/b]
Lunch Pail Labs is a Daily development partner and the maintainer of this plugin. We build third-party apps and integrations. To learn more about our work, visit [color=#1f2de6][url=https://lunchpaillabs.com]lunchpaillabs.com[/url][/color].
name: Daily Video Conferencing & Chat
plugin_instructions:
1.Create a Daily Account [color=#1f2de6][url=https://www.daily.co/]here[/url][/color].
3.Grab your API key from your [color=#1f2de6][url=https://dashboard.daily.co/developers]developer dashboard[/url][/color].
3.Enter your key into the plugin’s API key section with the prefix Bearer (example: Bearer 4feddedded...).

For more help getting started, visit the [color=#1f2de6][url=https://addons.lunchpaillabs.com/bubble/daily/getting-started]getting started guide[/url][/color] and explore our [color=#1f2de6][url=https://addons.lunchpaillabs.com/bubble/daily/how-tos/]how-tos[/url][/color].
